reg_info.act_under: Ontario Heritage Act   Loi sur le patrimoine de l’Ontario

content.content:
1. The lands described in an item of the Table are designated as an archaeological site.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 875, s. 1. Table Column 1 Site   Column 2 Lands 

  Forget Archaeological Site    Lands described in Schedule 1 

  The Lawson Site   Lands described in Schedule 4 

  The Roebuck Site   Lands described in Schedule 5 

  The Sheguiandah Archaelogical Site   Lands described in Schedule 2 

  Township of South Burleigh Archaeological Site   Lands described in Schedule 3 Note: In this Table, a reference to a Schedule is a reference to a Schedule to Regulation 709 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1980, as it read on the 31st day of December, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 875, Table.
